Role_Desc: Person/Pool-ID in the development department at Daimler Truck. Info: it does not automatically mean that this person works in the development team for the related ECU project, but this could be possible. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.

Person/Pool-ID in the development department at Daimler Truck. Info: it does not automatically mean that this person works in the development team for the related ECU project, but this could be possible. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.

Person at the ECU supplier who is responsible for managing keys at the supplier side for the related ECU project. Eg storing the ECU private key into the Key Management System (KMS) at the supplier. On applying for the functional role, the user should automatically receive Supplier, Development ENHANCED, Production, After-Sales ENHANCED for all the Cebid ECU's, After-Sales STANDARD Certificates as Standard Permissions.
Reason_for_supplier_FR: Functional role request for ECU Supplier - Key Management
